attributes.action: Pay all self employed workers.not just some of them we all pay tax.
attributes.additional_details:
Pay all self employed workers with over a years worth of tax returns and cis payments.

Be fare we pay on everything we earn in to the government purse the same as everyone one else that works
attributes.background: There are so many self employed people missing out on grants due to not having three years worth of tax returns.everyone should be entitled if you have paid your cis tokens on your earnings and filed your tax returns.within the last three years.self employed workers are seriously struggling.
